snippet: The health care law will affect not only who gets into the examining room, but also what goes on there.
abstract: Dr Abigail Zuger essay compares the health coverage provided under the upheld individual health insurance mandate to a rich uncle with deep pockets but a volatile personality, who sometimes helps, but just as often hinders patient care.
lead_paragraph: The health care law will affect not only who gets into the examining room, but also what goes on there.

headline.seo: Health Care Mandate Puts a Cranky Uncle in Every Exam Room
headline.main: Cranky Uncles, for Better or Worse, Will Lurk in More Exam Rooms
headline.print_headline: Cranky Uncles, for Better or Worse, Will Lurk in More Exam Rooms
